scene_description_enriched: A figure, possibly a prophet or saint, is depicted holding a banner inscribed with the word "Iona". The figure wears a headdress and a garment adorned with a circular pendant. The scene is framed by architectural elements, including a column on the left and an ornate arch above the figure. The background appears to be a decorative border with text and colored elements, suggesting it is part of a larger illuminated manuscript page.
